Class StudentManager

extends java.lang.Object
    A controller class to handle most services related to Student objects

      • updateCourseTaken

        public void updateCourseTaken​(Course course,
                              Student student)
        A utility method to update/synchronise the Course taken by Student.
        Parameters:
        course - Course object that Student is registered but need update
        student - Student object that need to be updated
        See Also:
        Student.registerCourse(Course)

      • printTranscript

        public void printTranscript​(Student student)
        A method to print out the transcript of Student object being parsed in.

        The transcript involved total grade of the Student for the semester and the results of Assessment components under each Course object that Student is registered in.

        First get the array of Course that Student is registered in. Next, declare and instantiate an empty array of Assessment objects to traverse later.

        Traverse the array of Course courseRegistered for the Student and access the list of Assessment components under each Course object being visited. By traversing this list of Assessment objects, print out the individual grade/marks for the components under the visited Course' Assessment. When last Assessment component is printed out, move to the next Course in the list.

        Repeat until all Course objects in the list is visited.

        This method make use of ArrayList methods for processing

        Parameters:
        student - Student object whose transcript need to be print out.
        See Also:
        ArrayList

      • marksToGrade

        public java.lang.String marksToGrade​(double marks)
        A utility method to convert number mark to letter grade.
        Parameters:
        marks - double the numeric marks to be converted
        Returns:
        String the letter grade of the numeric mark being queried.

      • marksToGPA

        public double marksToGPA​(double marks)
        A utility method to convert number mark to numerical grade-point average.
        Parameters:
        marks - the numeric marks to be converted.
        Returns:
        double the GPA of the subject.

      • deregisterCourse

        public void deregisterCourse​(Student student,
                             Course course)
        A method to control the removal of Student from Course (both passed in)
        Parameters:
        student - Student object that is of our interest to remove from the Course
        course - Course object where the Student must be removed from
        See Also:
        Student.deregisterCourse(Course)

      • printCourseRegistered

        public void printCourseRegistered​(Student student)
        A method to print all Course the Student object is registered under.

        This is done by getting the array of Course the student is registered under and print out. We are utilising ArrayList and its methods for this method.

        Parameters:
        student - Student object who we need to print out all the Course objects he/she is registered under
        See Also:
        Student.getCourseRegistered(), ArrayList
